OSGi Application Architecture

Show an OSGi project which can be run 24/7. The application auto-updates itself via staging/release repositories inside Nexus. Artifacts are published by Jenkins. Karaf monitors Nexus repository and updates OSGi-Bundles. Vortrag von W-JAX 2011 nutzen (Kerl von Talend)
